name: PoTII: RB
description:
﻿Introducing a first for The Prince of Tennis game franchise, a rhythm game featuring character songs!
Choose your favorites from the large cast of characters and play through dozens of songs!

◆A New Rhythm Action Game Featuring Character Songs
Create a unique Order and play Matches!
The chibi characters in your Order will play tennis
while you play through the character song!
The main theme for the game, ""RisingBeat,"" is also included!
Rise and play along to the beat of The Prince of Tennis character songs!

◆Welcome to the fiery U-17 (Under Seventeen) Training Camp!
The characters from The Prince of Tennis have arrived!
In addition to scenarios following the story of The Prince of Tennis II,
prepare for loads of card art and stories original to this game!

◆Create your own unique space with My Area!
Create a My Area where the adorable chibi character can hang out!
Whether you create a training room, tennis court, or a cozy room, the only limit is your imagination!

PoTII: RB Fan Club
◆Price & Period
$7.49/1 month (starting from the day you activate) Renewed Monthly

◆Benefits
・Play the Paid Gems x60 Beat Gem Gacha for free once per day.
・The number of times you can Auto Play without a ticket will increase from 5 times to 8 times a day.
・Recover AP without spending Beat Gems once per day.
・Resume a Match after running out of Tension up to five times a day without spending Beat Gems.
・Receive a limited My Area Item when you first sign up.
・Receive Boost Tickets when you first sign up.
・Receive Boost Tickets every month you renew your membership.
・Receive an SSR Ticket every three months you renew your membership.

◆About Automatic Renewal
As long as you do not cancel your PoTII: RB Fan Club membership at least 24 hours before the expiry date of your membership, it will be automatically renewed.
Renewal fees will be billed within 24 hours before the membership expires.

◆Fees
Fees will be billed through your iTunes account.

You can check or cancel your PoTII: RB Fan Club membership by following these steps:
1. Go to the App Store.
2. Tap your Apple ID icon at the top.
Note: If you are using a device below iOS 10, Go to the App Store, tap "Recommended" and scroll down to tap Apple ID (Email Address).
3. Tap "Subscriptions."
From there, you may confirm when the next automatic renewal will take place. You may also check the details regarding the renewal or cancel your membership from here.
You may also perform the above actions through your iTunes account.
